title: Groundwater denitrification enhanced by a hydrogel immobilized iron/solid carbon source: impact on denitrification and substrate release performance
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3EM00444A, Paper
Wenhao Yu, Lecheng Liu, Ni Yan, Xilai Zheng
Different weight ratios of ZVI to solid carbon sources showed different substrate release behaviors and denitrification mechanisms.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
